src: [start] ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? [MASK] RC : Well , um , we 'd like to go to room 17 for an appointment . Where is ... Which way should we go to get to room 17 ? [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] LP : Do you think he 's going to take us to room 17 ? Because it looks like he 's stuck here . RC : Oh , I think so . Room 17 ... [MASK] LP : How could we ask him ? RC : It is room 17 that you 're showing us to ? ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : So everything 's fine , we can go . We have an appointment in 5 minutes , do we have time to go there ? ARI : Yes , of course . [MASK] [end] LP : Yes , my friend has forgotten his appointment time . He ca n't remember the doctor 's name either , can you help us please ? Will he ever move ? # request ( appt ( time ) ) ; request ( doctor ( name ) ) ARI : I 'm going to call a nurse to come and inform you . Do you have any other questions ? # call-nurse ( ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : We 'll wait for the nurse . ARI : Yes . # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , goodbye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) RC : Goodbye . # bye ( )

ARI : Yes , you 're right . # affirm ( ) RC : So everything 's fine , we can go . We have an appointment in 5 minutes , do we have time to go there ? ARI : Yes , of course . # affirm ( )

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? [MASK] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [end] RP : Ok , and we have time to have a coffee before going upstairs , is that right ? # acknowledge ( ) ; request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) RP : Wait , so we 'll go to the cafeteria before taking the lift .

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] RC : Well , shall we go and eat ? [MASK] LP : I think ... [MASK] LP : It 's my first time here and I 'm a bit lost , I 'd like to find ... I think I need to go to the toilet before starting because afterwards I have an appointment with the doctor . Could you tell me ... I must use informal register . Could you , could you tell me how to find the toilets , please ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] ARI : Can I help you ? [MASK] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? [MASK] RC : So we 'd like to go and eat , is there a cafeteria here ? [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . src: [start] LP : Well , yeah , but you do what you want . LP : What time is my appointment with the doctor ? [MASK] RC : I think it 's 10 o'clock . [MASK] RC : What time is the appointment ? [MASK] RC : I have an appointment with the doctor . [MASK] ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] LP : And who is my geriatrician ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : That 's a shame . [MASK] LP : And where is the consultation room to go see my doctor ? RC : Is it my turn ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Is it right or left ? LP : Is there a reception at the hospital ? [MASK] RC : Yes , I think so . [MASK] RC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Where do I go for information ? [MASK] LP : I 'd like a coffee . [MASK] RC : Where is the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] LP : How do we get to the ground floor ? [MASK] RC : How do we get to the ground floor ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Which floor is the cafeteria on ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Where is the cafeteria ? src: LP : Hello ARI . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Ask how ... [MASK] RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . [MASK] RP : Ok , he told us to go to the building behind us , it 's the second door on the left . He 's giving us directions . That 's handy . There you go . [MASK] LC : Ok.
